name: Mongoid-cleaner
tagline: Cleaner for Mongoid with drop and truncation strategy.
body:
Requirements
------------

* [MongoDB] 3.x
* [Mongoid] 5.x

Installation
------------

1. Add Mongoid Cleaner to your Gemfile:

    ```ruby
    gem 'mongoid-cleaner', github: 'bitaculous/mongoid-cleaner'
    ```

2. Run `bundle` to install all dependencies with [Bundler]

Usage
-----

```ruby
Mongoid::Cleaner.strategy = 'drop', { only: %w(users) }
Mongoid::Cleaner.clean

Mongoid::Cleaner.strategy = 'truncate', { except: %w(users) }
Mongoid::Cleaner.clean
```

With [Rspec]:

```ruby
RSpec.configure do |config|
  config.before(:suite) do
    Mongoid::Cleaner.strategy = :drop
  end

  config.around(:each) do |example|
    Mongoid::Cleaner.cleaning do
      example.run
    end
  end
end
```

Development
-----------

### Run specs with [RSpec]

Run `rspec`.

or via [Guard]:

```
$ guard -g spec
```

### See Test Coverage

Run `COVERAGE=true rspec`.

### Run [RuboCop]

Run `rubocop`.

To run all specs and RuboCop altogether, run `rake`.
